description: An all-in-one solution for video downloading, AI subtitling, translation, and video production.

endToEnd.title: One-Click Subtitled Video (Auto Mode)
endToEnd.description: Enter a video link to automatically download, subscribe, and render the final video.

newProject.title: New Project
newProject.description: Upload local video, generate and translate subtitles

openSubtitle.title: Open Subtitle
openSubtitle.description: Import existing subtitle files for editing or proofreading

compression.title: Video Compression
compression.description: Embed subtitles into video and export

webWarning: ⚠️ These features and Auto Mode are unavailable in the web version. Please use the desktop app for the best experience.
